name: Classic Earthen Vase
detail: A tall handcrafted vase made from natural clay with a matte finish.
description: Perfect for both modern and traditional interiors, this vase showcases timeless craftsmanship.

name: Rustic Water Jug
detail: A wide-mouthed jug with traditional earthen textures.
description: Keeps water naturally cool and adds a rustic touch to your dining table.

name: Floral Painted Bowl
detail: Hand-painted floral designs on a clay bowl.
description: Ideal for serving fruits or as a decorative centerpiece.

name: Minimalist Clay Cup Set
detail: Set of 4 small clay cups with smooth finishing.
description: Perfect for tea lovers who prefer authentic earthy flavors.

name: Terracotta Lamp
detail: Clay lamp with carved cutout patterns for soft light glow.
description: Creates a warm and cozy ambiance in any room.

name: Earthen Planter
detail: Medium-sized clay planter with drainage hole.
description: Best for indoor plants and succulents.

name: Traditional Clay Plate
detail: Flat clay plate with hand-burnished surface.
description: Used for authentic traditional dining experience.

name: Glazed Ceramic Pot
detail: Clay pot with glossy glaze finish.
description: Perfect for cooking or serving dishes with style.

name: Decorative Clay Sculpture
detail: Small decorative figurine crafted from clay.
description: Adds artistic value to home or office spaces.

name: Matka Storage Pot
detail: Large round clay pot for storing water or grains.
description: An age-old storage solution with cooling effect.

name: Clay Candle Holder
detail: Small clay holder designed for candles or tea lights.
description: Brings an earthy glow to any space.

name: Engraved Clay Mug
detail: Clay mug with engraved tribal designs.
description: Great for coffee or herbal drinks, with unique hand-carved patterns.
